00059 b3GpuSapBroadphase::b3GpuSapBroadphase(cl_context ctx,cl_device_id device, cl_command_queue  q , b3GpuSapKernelType kernelType)
00060 :m_context(ctx),
00061 m_device(device),
00062 m_queue(q),
00063 
00064 m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis0(ctx,q),
00065 m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis1(ctx,q),
00066 m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis2(ctx,q),
00067 m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis0prev(ctx,q),
00068 m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis1prev(ctx,q),
00069 m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis2prev(ctx,q),
00070 m_sortedAxisGPU0(ctx,q),
00071 m_sortedAxisGPU1(ctx,q),
00072 m_sortedAxisGPU2(ctx,q),
00073 m_sortedAxisGPU0prev(ctx,q),
00074 m_sortedAxisGPU1prev(ctx,q),
00075 m_sortedAxisGPU2prev(ctx,q),
00076 m_addedHostPairsGPU(ctx,q),
00077 m_removedHostPairsGPU(ctx,q),
00078 m_addedCountGPU(ctx,q),
00079 m_removedCountGPU(ctx,q),

00081 m_pairCount(ctx,q),
00082 m_allAabbsGPU(ctx,q),
00083 m_sum(ctx,q),
00084 m_sum2(ctx,q),
00085 m_dst(ctx,q),
00086 m_smallAabbsMappingGPU(ctx,q),
00087 m_largeAabbsMappingGPU(ctx,q),
00088 m_overlappingPairs(ctx,q),
00089 m_gpuSmallSortData(ctx,q),
00090 m_gpuSmallSortedAabbs(ctx,q)
00091 {
00092         const char* sapSrc = sapCL;
00093     
00094     
00095         cl_int errNum=0;
00096 
00097         b3Assert(m_context);
00098         b3Assert(m_device);
00099         cl_program sapProg = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLProgramFromString(m_context,m_device,sapSrc,&errNum,"",B3_BROADPHASE_SAP_PATH);
00100         b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00101 
00102 
00103         b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00104 #ifndef __APPLE__
00105         m_prefixScanFloat4 = new b3PrefixScanFloat4CL(m_context,m_device,m_queue);
00106 #else
00107         m_prefixScanFloat4 = 0;
00108 #endif
00109         m_sapKernel = 0;
00110         
00111         switch (kernelType)
00112         {
00113                 case B3_GPU_SAP_KERNEL_BRUTE_FORCE_CPU:
00114                 {
00115                         m_sapKernel=0;
00116                         break;
00117                 }
00118                 case            B3_GPU_SAP_KERNEL_BRUTE_FORCE_GPU:
00119                 {
00120                         m_sapKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_context, m_device,sapSrc, "computePairsKernelBruteForce",&errNum,sapProg );
00121                         break;
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 case B3_GPU_SAP_KERNEL_ORIGINAL:
00125                 {
00126                         m_sapKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_context, m_device,sapSrc, "computePairsKernelOriginal",&errNum,sapProg );
00127                         break;
00128                 }
00129                 case B3_GPU_SAP_KERNEL_BARRIER:
00130                 {
00131                         m_sapKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_context, m_device,sapSrc, "computePairsKernelBarrier",&errNum,sapProg );
00132                         break;
00133                 }
00134                 case B3_GPU_SAP_KERNEL_LOCAL_SHARED_MEMORY:
00135                 {
00136                         m_sapKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_context, m_device,sapSrc, "computePairsKernelLocalSharedMemory",&errNum,sapProg );
00137                         break;
00138                 }
00139 
00140                 default:
00141                 {
00142                         m_sapKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_context, m_device,sapSrc, "computePairsKernelLocalSharedMemory",&errNum,sapProg );
00143                         b3Error("Unknown 3D GPU SAP provided, fallback to computePairsKernelLocalSharedMemory");
00144                 }
00145         };
00146         
00147                 
00148         
00149         m_sap2Kernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_context, m_device,sapSrc, "computePairsKernelTwoArrays",&errNum,sapProg );
00150         b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00151 
00152         m_prepareSumVarianceKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_context, m_device,sapSrc, "prepareSumVarianceKernel",&errNum,sapProg );
00153         b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00154 
00155                 
00156         m_flipFloatKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_context, m_device,sapSrc, "flipFloatKernel",&errNum,sapProg );
00157 
00158         m_copyAabbsKernel= b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_context, m_device,sapSrc, "copyAabbsKernel",&errNum,sapProg );
00159 
00160         m_scatterKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_context, m_device,sapSrc, "scatterKernel",&errNum,sapProg );
00161 
00162         m_sorter = new b3RadixSort32CL(m_context,m_device,m_queue);
00163 }

00179 
00181 static bool TestAabbAgainstAabb2(const b3Vector3 &aabbMin1, const b3Vector3 &aabbMax1,
00182                                                                 const b3Vector3 &aabbMin2, const b3Vector3 &aabbMax2)
00183 {
00184         bool overlap = true;
00185         overlap = (aabbMin1.getX() > aabbMax2.getX() || aabbMax1.getX() < aabbMin2.getX()) ? false : overlap;
00186         overlap = (aabbMin1.getZ() > aabbMax2.getZ() || aabbMax1.getZ() < aabbMin2.getZ()) ? false : overlap;
00187         overlap = (aabbMin1.getY() > aabbMax2.getY() || aabbMax1.getY() < aabbMin2.getY()) ? false : overlap;
00188         return overlap;
00189 }

00193 //http://stereopsis.com/radix.html
00194 static unsigned int FloatFlip(float fl)
00195 {
00196         unsigned int f = *(unsigned int*)&fl;
00197         unsigned int mask = -(int)(f >> 31) | 0x80000000;
00198         return f ^ mask;
00199 };

00201 void  b3GpuSapBroadphase::init3dSap()
00202 {
00203         if (m_currentBuffer<0)
00204         {
00205                 m_allAabbsGPU.copyToHost(m_allAabbsCPU);
00206 
00207                 m_currentBuffer = 0;
00208                 for (int axis=0;axis<3;axis++)
00209                 {
00210                         for (int buf=0;buf<2;buf++)
00211                         {
00212                                 int totalNumAabbs = m_allAabbsCPU.size();
00213                                 int numEndPoints = 2*totalNumAabbs;
00214                                 m_sortedAxisCPU[axis][buf].resize(numEndPoints);
00215 
00216                                 if (buf==m_currentBuffer)
00217                                 {
00218                                         for (int i=0;i<totalNumAabbs;i++)
00219                                         {
00220                                                 m_sortedAxisCPU[axis][buf][i*2].m_key = FloatFlip(m_allAabbsCPU[i].m_min[axis])-1;
00221                                                 m_sortedAxisCPU[axis][buf][i*2].m_value = i*2;
00222                                                 m_sortedAxisCPU[axis][buf][i*2+1].m_key = FloatFlip(m_allAabbsCPU[i].m_max[axis])+1;
00223                                                 m_sortedAxisCPU[axis][buf][i*2+1].m_value = i*2+1;
00224                                         }
00225                                 }
00226                         }
00227                 }
00228 
00229                 for (int axis=0;axis<3;axis++)
00230                 {
00231                         m_sorter->executeHost(m_sortedAxisCPU[axis][m_currentBuffer]);
00232                 }
00233 
00234                 for (int axis=0;axis<3;axis++)
00235                 {
00236                         //int totalNumAabbs = m_allAabbsCPU.size();
00237                         int numEndPoints = m_sortedAxisCPU[axis][m_currentBuffer].size();
00238                         m_objectMinMaxIndexCPU[axis][m_currentBuffer].resize(numEndPoints);
00239                         for (int i=0;i<numEndPoints;i++)
00240                         {
00241                                 int destIndex = m_sortedAxisCPU[axis][m_currentBuffer][i].m_value;
00242                                 int newDest = destIndex/2;
00243                                 if (destIndex&1)
00244                                 {
00245                                         m_objectMinMaxIndexCPU[axis][m_currentBuffer][newDest].y=i;
00246                                 } else
00247                                 {
00248                                         m_objectMinMaxIndexCPU[axis][m_currentBuffer][newDest].x=i;
00249                                 }
00250                         }
00251                 }
00252 
00253         }
00254 }

00257 static bool b3PairCmp(const b3Int4& p, const b3Int4& q)
00258 {
00259         return ((p.x<q.x) || ((p.x==q.x) && (p.y<q.y)));
00260 }
00261 
00262 
00263 static bool operator==(const b3Int4& a,const b3Int4& b)
00264 {
00265         return a.x == b.x && a.y == b.y;
00266 };
00267 
00268 static bool operator<(const b3Int4& a,const b3Int4& b)
00269 {
00270         return a.x < b.x || (a.x == b.x && a.y < b.y);
00271 };
00272 
00273 static bool operator>(const b3Int4& a,const b3Int4& b)
00274 {
00275         return a.x > b.x || (a.x == b.x && a.y > b.y);
00276 };

00521                         m_addedCountGPU.push_back(0);
00522                         m_removedCountGPU.resize(0);
00523                         m_removedCountGPU.push_back(0);
00524                 }
00525 
00526                 {
00527                         B3_PROFILE("launch1D");
00528                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue,  m_computePairsIncremental3dSapKernel,"m_computePairsIncremental3dSapKernel");
00529                         launcher.setBuffer(m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis0.getBufferCL());
00530                         launcher.setBuffer(m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis1.getBufferCL());
00531                         launcher.setBuffer(m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis2.getBufferCL());
00532                         launcher.setBuffer(m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis0prev.getBufferCL());
00533                         launcher.setBuffer(m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis1prev.getBufferCL());
00534                         launcher.setBuffer(m_objectMinMaxIndexGPUaxis2prev.getBufferCL());

00551                         clFinish(m_queue);
00552                 }
00553 
00554                 {

00564                         //printf("removedCountGPU=%d\n",removedCountGPU);

00567

00570         } 
00571         else
00572         */
00573         {

00577                 for (int i=0;i<numObjects;i++)
00578                 {
00579                         //int numObjects = m_objectMinMaxIndexCPU[axis][m_currentBuffer].size();
00580                         //int checkObjects[]={40,53};

00586                         {

00591                                 unsigned int prevMinIndex = m_objectMinMaxIndexCPU[axis][1-m_currentBuffer][i].x;
00592                                 int dmin = curMinIndex - prevMinIndex;
00593                                 
00594                                 unsigned int prevMaxIndex = m_objectMinMaxIndexCPU[axis][1-m_currentBuffer][i].y;
00595 
00596                                 
00597 
00598                                 int dmax = curMaxIndex - prevMaxIndex;
00599                                 if (dmin!=0)
00600                                 {
00601                                         //printf("for object %d, dmin=%d\n",i,dmin);
00602                                 }
00603                                 if (dmax!=0)
00604                                 {
00605                                         //printf("for object %d, dmax=%d\n",i,dmax);
00606                                 }
00607                                 for (int otherbuffer = 0;otherbuffer<2;otherbuffer++)
00608                                 {
00609                                         if (dmin!=0)
00610                                         {
00611                                                 int stepMin = dmin<0 ? -1 : 1;
00612                                                 for (int j=prevMinIndex;j!=curMinIndex;j+=stepMin)
00613                                                 {
00614                                                         int otherIndex2 = m_sortedAxisCPU[axis][otherbuffer][j].y;
00615                                                         int otherIndex = otherIndex2/2;
00616                                                         if (otherIndex!=i)
00617                                                         {
00618                                                                 bool otherIsMax = ((otherIndex2&1)!=0);
00619 
00620                                                                 if (otherIsMax)
00621                                                                 {
00622                                                                         //bool overlap = TestAabbAgainstAabb2((const b3Vector3&)m_allAabbsCPU[i].m_min, (const b3Vector3&)m_allAabbsCPU[i].m_max,(const b3Vector3&)m_allAabbsCPU[otherIndex].m_min,(const b3Vector3&)m_allAabbsCPU[otherIndex].m_max);
00623                                                                         //bool prevOverlap = TestAabbAgainstAabb2((const b3Vector3&)preAabbs[i].m_min, (const b3Vector3&)preAabbs[i].m_max,(const b3Vector3&)preAabbs[otherIndex].m_min,(const b3Vector3&)preAabbs[otherIndex].m_max);

00641                                                                                         (m_objectMinMaxIndexCPU[ax][1-m_currentBuffer][i].y < m_objectMinMaxIndexCPU[ax][1-m_currentBuffer][otherIndex].x))
00642                                                                                         prevOverlap=false;
00643                                                                         }
00644                                                                         
00645 
00646                                                                         //b3Assert(overlap==overlap2);
00647

00651                                                                         {
00652                                                                                 if (overlap && !prevOverlap)
00653                                                                                 {
00654                                                                                         //add a pair
00655                                                                                         b3Int4 newPair;

00671                                                                                 {

00675                                                                                         if (i<=otherIndex)
00676                                                                                         {
00677                                                                                                 removedPair.x = i;
00678                                                                                                 removedPair.y = otherIndex;
00679                                                                                         } else
00680                                                                                         {
00681                                                                                                 removedPair.x = otherIndex;

00683                                                                                         }

00685                                                                                 }

00687                                                                 }//if (dmin<0)

00689                                                 }//for (int j=
00690                                         }

00696                                                 {

00706

00773                 }//for (int i=0;i<numObjects
00774         }
00775 
00776         //remove duplicates and add/remove then to existing m_overlappingPairs
00777         
00778         
00779         
00780         {
00781                 {
00782                         B3_PROFILE("sort allPairs");
00783                         allPairs.quickSort(b3PairCmp);
00784                 }
00785                 {

00787                         addedHostPairs.quickSort(b3PairCmp);
00788                 }
00789                 {
00790                         B3_PROFILE("sort removedHostPairs");
00791                         removedHostPairs.quickSort(b3PairCmp);
00792                 }

00794 
00795         b3Int4 prevPair;
00796         prevPair.x = -1;
00797         prevPair.y = -1;
00798

00800 
00801         b3AlignedObjectArray<int> removedPositions;
00802 
00803         {
00804                 B3_PROFILE("actual removing");
00805                 for (int i=0;i<removedHostPairs.size();i++)
00806                 {
00807                         b3Int4 removedPair = removedHostPairs[i];
00808                         if ((removedPair.x != prevPair.x) || (removedPair.y != prevPair.y))
00809                         {
00810 
00811                         int index1 = allPairs.findBinarySearch(removedPair);
00812 
00813         //#ifdef _DEBUG
00814                                 
00815                                 
00816         
00817                                 int index2 = allPairs.findLinearSearch(removedPair);
00818                                 b3Assert(index1==index2);
00819         
00820                                 //b3Assert(index1!=allPairs.size());
00821                                 if (index1<allPairs.size())
00822         //#endif//_DEBUG
00823                                 {
00824                                         uniqueRemovedPairs++;
00825                                         removedPositions.push_back(index1);
00826                                         {
00827                                                 //printf("framepje(%d) remove pair(%d):%d,%d\n",framepje,i,removedPair.x,removedPair.y);
00828                                         }
00829                                 }
00830                         }
00831                         prevPair = removedPair;
00832                 }
00833 
00834                 if (uniqueRemovedPairs)
00835                 {
00836                         for (int i=0;i<removedPositions.size();i++)
00837                         {
00838                                 allPairs[removedPositions[i]].x = INT_MAX ;
00839                                 allPairs[removedPositions[i]].y = INT_MAX ;
00840                         }
00841                         allPairs.quickSort(b3PairCmp);
00842                         allPairs.resize(allPairs.size()-uniqueRemovedPairs);
00843                 }
00844         }
00845         //if (uniqueRemovedPairs)
00846         //      printf("uniqueRemovedPairs=%d\n",uniqueRemovedPairs);
00847         //printf("removedHostPairs.size = %d\n",removedHostPairs.size());
00848 
00849         prevPair.x = -1;
00850         prevPair.y = -1;

00855         {
00856                 B3_PROFILE("actual adding");
00857                 for (int i=0;i<addedHostPairs.size();i++)
00858                 {
00859                         b3Int4 newPair = addedHostPairs[i];
00860                         if ((newPair.x != prevPair.x) || (newPair.y != prevPair.y))
00861                         {
00862 //#ifdef _DEBUG         
00863                                 int index1 = allPairs.findBinarySearch(newPair);
00864                                 
00865         
00866                                 int index2 = allPairs.findLinearSearch(newPair);
00867                                 b3Assert(index1==index2);
00868         
00869 
00870                                 b3Assert(index1==allPairs.size());
00871                                 if (index1!=allPairs.size())
00872                                 {
00873                                         printf("??\n");
00874                                 }
00875 
00876                                 if (index1==allPairs.size())
00877 //#endif //_DEBUG
00878                                 {
00879                                         uniqueAddedPairs++;
00880                                         actualAddedPairs.push_back(newPair);
00881                                 }
00882                         }
00883                         prevPair = newPair;
00884                 }
00885                 for (int i=0;i<actualAddedPairs.size();i++)
00886                 {
00887                         //printf("framepje (%d), new pair(%d):%d,%d\n",framepje,i,actualAddedPairs[i].x,actualAddedPairs[i].y);
00888                         allPairs.push_back(actualAddedPairs[i]);
00889                 }
00890         }
00891         
00892         //if (uniqueAddedPairs)
00893         //      printf("uniqueAddedPairs=%d\n", uniqueAddedPairs);
00894 
00895 
00896         {
00897                 B3_PROFILE("m_overlappingPairs.copyFromHost");
00898                 m_overlappingPairs.copyFromHost(allPairs);
00899         }
00900 
00901         
00902 }

00905 
00906 
00907 void  b3GpuSapBroadphase::calculateOverlappingPairsHost(int maxPairs)
00908 {
00909         //test
00910 //      if (m_currentBuffer>=0)
00911         //      return calculateOverlappingPairsHostIncremental3Sap();
00912 
00913         b3Assert(m_allAabbsCPU.size() == m_allAabbsGPU.size());
00914         m_allAabbsGPU.copyToHost(m_allAabbsCPU);
00915 
00916 
00917         
00918         int axis=0;
00919         {
00920                 B3_PROFILE("CPU compute best variance axis");
00921                 b3Vector3 s=b3MakeVector3(0,0,0),s2=b3MakeVector3(0,0,0);
00922                 int numRigidBodies = m_smallAabbsMappingCPU.size();
00923 
00924                 for(int i=0;i<numRigidBodies;i++) 
00925                 {
00926                         b3SapAabb aabb = this->m_allAabbsCPU[m_smallAabbsMappingCPU[i]];
00927 
00928                         b3Vector3 maxAabb=b3MakeVector3(aabb.m_max[0],aabb.m_max[1],aabb.m_max[2]);
00929                         b3Vector3 minAabb=b3MakeVector3(aabb.m_min[0],aabb.m_min[1],aabb.m_min[2]);
00930                         b3Vector3 centerAabb=(maxAabb+minAabb)*0.5f;
00931                                                 
00932                         s += centerAabb;
00933                         s2 += centerAabb*centerAabb;
00934                 }
00935                 b3Vector3 v = s2 - (s*s) / (float)numRigidBodies;
00936                 
00937                 if(v[1] > v[0]) 
00938                         axis = 1;
00939                 if(v[2] > v[axis]) 
00940                         axis = 2;
00941         }
00942 
00943 
00944         
00945 
00946         b3AlignedObjectArray<b3Int4> hostPairs;
00947 
00948         {
00949                 int numSmallAabbs = m_smallAabbsMappingCPU.size();
00950                 for (int i=0;i<numSmallAabbs;i++)
00951                 {
00952                         b3SapAabb smallAabbi = m_allAabbsCPU[m_smallAabbsMappingCPU[i]];
00953                         //float reference = smallAabbi.m_max[axis];
00954 
00955                         for (int j=i+1;j<numSmallAabbs;j++)
00956                         {
00957 
00958                                 b3SapAabb smallAabbj = m_allAabbsCPU[m_smallAabbsMappingCPU[j]];
00959 
00960                                 if (TestAabbAgainstAabb2((b3Vector3&)smallAabbi.m_min, (b3Vector3&)smallAabbi.m_max,
00961                                         (b3Vector3&)smallAabbj.m_min,(b3Vector3&)smallAabbj.m_max))
00962                                 {
00963                                         b3Int4 pair;
00964                                         int a = smallAabbi.m_minIndices[3];
00965                                         int b = smallAabbj.m_minIndices[3];
00966                                         if (a<=b)
00967                                         {
00968                                                 pair.x = a;//store the original index in the unsorted aabb array
00969                                                 pair.y = b;
00970                                         } else
00971                                         {
00972                                                 pair.x = b;//store the original index in the unsorted aabb array
00973                                                 pair.y = a;
00974                                         }
00975                                         hostPairs.push_back(pair);
00976                                 }
00977                         }
00978                 }
00979         }
00980 
00981         
00982         {
00983                 int numSmallAabbs = m_smallAabbsMappingCPU.size();
00984                 for (int i=0;i<numSmallAabbs;i++)
00985                 {
00986                         b3SapAabb smallAabbi = m_allAabbsCPU[m_smallAabbsMappingCPU[i]];
00987 
00988                         //float reference = smallAabbi.m_max[axis];
00989                         int numLargeAabbs = m_largeAabbsMappingCPU.size();
00990 
00991                         for (int j=0;j<numLargeAabbs;j++)
00992                         {
00993                                 b3SapAabb largeAabbj = m_allAabbsCPU[m_largeAabbsMappingCPU[j]];
00994                                 if (TestAabbAgainstAabb2((b3Vector3&)smallAabbi.m_min, (b3Vector3&)smallAabbi.m_max,
00995                                         (b3Vector3&)largeAabbj.m_min,(b3Vector3&)largeAabbj.m_max))
00996                                 {
00997                                         b3Int4 pair;
00998                                         int a = largeAabbj.m_minIndices[3];
00999                                         int b = smallAabbi.m_minIndices[3];
01000                                         if (a<=b)
01001                                         {
01002                                                 pair.x = a; 
01003                                                 pair.y = b;//store the original index in the unsorted aabb array
01004                                         } else
01005                                         {
01006                                                 pair.x = b;
01007                                                 pair.y = a;//store the original index in the unsorted aabb array
01008                                         }
01009                                         
01010                                         hostPairs.push_back(pair);
01011                                 }
01012                         }
01013                 }
01014         }
01015 
01016         if (hostPairs.size() > maxPairs)
01017         {
01018                 hostPairs.resize(maxPairs);
01019         }
01020 
01021         if (hostPairs.size())
01022         {
01023                 m_overlappingPairs.copyFromHost(hostPairs);
01024         } else
01025         {
01026                 m_overlappingPairs.resize(0);
01027         }
01028 
01029         //init3dSap();
01030 
01031 }
01032 
01033 void  b3GpuSapBroadphase::reset()
01034 {
01035         m_allAabbsGPU.resize(0);
01036         m_allAabbsCPU.resize(0);
01037 
01038 
01039         m_smallAabbsMappingGPU.resize(0);
01040         m_smallAabbsMappingCPU.resize(0);
01041 
01042         m_pairCount.resize(0);
01043 
01044         m_largeAabbsMappingGPU.resize(0);
01045         m_largeAabbsMappingCPU.resize(0);
01046 
01047 }
01048 
01049 
01050 void  b3GpuSapBroadphase::calculateOverlappingPairs(int maxPairs)
01051 {
01052         if (m_sapKernel==0)
01053         {
01054                 calculateOverlappingPairsHost(maxPairs);
01055                 return;
01056         }
01057 
01058         //if (m_currentBuffer>=0)
01059         //      return calculateOverlappingPairsHostIncremental3Sap();
01060 
01061         //calculateOverlappingPairsHost(maxPairs);
01062 
01063         B3_PROFILE("GPU 1-axis SAP calculateOverlappingPairs");
01064 
01065         int axis = 0;
01066 
01067         {
01068 
01069         //bool syncOnHost = false;
01070 
01071         int numSmallAabbs = m_smallAabbsMappingCPU.size();
01072         if (m_prefixScanFloat4 && numSmallAabbs)
01073         {
01074                 B3_PROFILE("GPU compute best variance axis");
01075                 
01076                 if (m_dst.size()!=(numSmallAabbs+1))
01077                 {
01078                         m_dst.resize(numSmallAabbs+128);
01079                         m_sum.resize(numSmallAabbs+128);
01080                         m_sum2.resize(numSmallAabbs+128);
01081                         m_sum.at(numSmallAabbs)=b3MakeVector3(0,0,0); //slow?
01082                         m_sum2.at(numSmallAabbs)=b3MakeVector3(0,0,0); //slow?
01083                 }
01084 
01085                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_prepareSumVarianceKernel ,"m_prepareSumVarianceKernel");
01086                 launcher.setBuffer(m_allAabbsGPU.getBufferCL());
01087                 
01088                 launcher.setBuffer(m_smallAabbsMappingGPU.getBufferCL());
01089                 launcher.setBuffer(m_sum.getBufferCL());
01090                 launcher.setBuffer(m_sum2.getBufferCL());
01091                 launcher.setConst( numSmallAabbs  );
01092                 int num = numSmallAabbs;

01098                 m_prefixScanFloat4->execute(m_sum,m_dst,numSmallAabbs+1,&s);
01099                 m_prefixScanFloat4->execute(m_sum2,m_dst,numSmallAabbs+1,&s2);
01100 
01101                 b3Vector3 v = s2 - (s*s) / (float)numSmallAabbs;
01102                 
01103                 if(v[1] > v[0]) 
01104                         axis = 1;
01105                 if(v[2] > v[axis]) 
01106                         axis = 2;
01107         }

01276             m_overlappingPairs.copyFromHost(hostOoverlappingPairs);
01277             //printf("hello %d\n", m_overlappingPairs.size());

01280

01297 void b3GpuSapBroadphase::writeAabbsToGpu()
01298 {

01300         m_largeAabbsMappingGPU.copyFromHost(m_largeAabbsMappingCPU);
01301 
01302         m_allAabbsGPU.copyFromHost(m_allAabbsCPU);//might not be necessary, the 'setupGpuAabbsFull' already takes care of this
01303         
01304         
01305

01307 
01308 void b3GpuSapBroadphase::createLargeProxy(const b3Vector3& aabbMin,  const b3Vector3& aabbMax, int userPtr , int collisionFilterGroup, int collisionFilterMask)
01309 {
01310         int index = userPtr;
01311         b3SapAabb aabb;
01312         for (int i=0;i<4;i++)
01313         {
01314                 aabb.m_min[i] = aabbMin[i];
01315                 aabb.m_max[i] = aabbMax[i];
01316         }
01317         aabb.m_minIndices[3] = index;
01318         aabb.m_signedMaxIndices[3] = m_allAabbsCPU.size();
01319         m_largeAabbsMappingCPU.push_back(m_allAabbsCPU.size());
01320         
01321         m_allAabbsCPU.push_back(aabb);
01322 }
01323 
01324 void b3GpuSapBroadphase::createProxy(const b3Vector3& aabbMin,  const b3Vector3& aabbMax, int userPtr , int collisionFilterGroup, int collisionFilterMask)
01325 {
01326         int index = userPtr;
01327         b3SapAabb aabb;
01328         for (int i=0;i<4;i++)
01329         {
01330                 aabb.m_min[i] = aabbMin[i];
01331                 aabb.m_max[i] = aabbMax[i];
01332         }
01333         aabb.m_minIndices[3] = index;
01334         aabb.m_signedMaxIndices[3] = m_allAabbsCPU.size();
01335         m_smallAabbsMappingCPU.push_back(m_allAabbsCPU.size());
01336 
01337 
01338         m_allAabbsCPU.push_back(aabb);
01339 }
